Protein Names: Siroheme synthase 2 [Includes: Uroporphyrinogen-III C-methyltransferase 2 (Urogen III methylase 2) (EC 2.1.1.107) (SUMT 2) (Uroporphyrinogen III methylase 2) (UROM 2); Precorrin-2 dehydrogenase 2 (EC 1.3.1.76); Sirohydrochlorin ferrochelatase 2 (EC 4.99.1.4)]
Organism: Halorhodospira halophila (strain DSM 244 / SL1) (Ectothiorhodospira halophila (strain DSM 244 / SL1))
